Course Description: THIS COURSE IS AN INTRODUCTION TO ACCOUNTING AND ITS BASIC CONCEPTS. STUDENTS WILL LEARN HOW TO RECORD, UNDERSTAND, AND REVIEW FINANCIAL TRANSACTIONS. AMONG THE TOPICS STUDIED, WE HAVE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, INFORMATION SYSTEMS, ACCRUAL ACCOUNTING, SALES AND RECEIVABLES, AND OPERATING ASSETS.
Textbook(s):
CORNERSTONES OF FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING 4TH EDITION
RICH, JONES
2017/CENGAGE LEARNING
ISBN-13: 1337690881
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
